name: Space Driftwood
description:
WASD to move, left click to shoot lasers, right click to launch bombs.

Try not to blow yourself up or get overwhelmed by enemies.

Dock in the station to repair and upgrade your ship.

I have a tutorial series on my youtube channel if you want to watch the creation of this game as well as others.

https://www.youtube.com/DriftwoodGamingMV
